page.title: 04CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Here are some of the games which are played in Great Britian in the 1980's.The first game is called it!which is one of the most popular games played in Great Britian.To play you have to have a group of children. One person is got to be it while the other people run away.When the person who is it! catches them they are it instead of the person who has just been it.Another game which is played is Leapfrog.You play Leapfrog with four or five people how line up and bend down.One person runs up to the line and jumps over the other children.When the jumper has jumped over each one they bend down and the last one begins the process all again.
